item.title: Version 0.9.9.7
item.description:
Release 0.9.9.7

Your conversations now have a home. Save threads, pick up where you left off, and enjoy cleaner responses with improved markdown rendering.

  • Conversation Threads - Save and return to conversations anytime with named threads
  • Cleaner Responses - Completely refreshed markdown rendering for better readability
  • Your Data, Secured - Local database encryption with SQLCipher
  • Granola Gets Smarter - Access meeting folders and participants
  • Remote Tools - Periodic refresh of connected tools and improved proxy support
  • Bug Fixes - Fixed typeahead regressions, workflow bugs, and display crashes

item.title: Version 0.9.9.6.2
item.description:
Workflow creation just got easier with AI

Build faster, smarter workflows by turning rough ideas into polished automation.

AI-Powered Workflows

  • AI generates names and descriptions, suggests improvements, and lets you test workflows before saving with "try and tweak"
  • Run custom workflows directly on Brief cards
  • Remix existing workflows with AI help

New Integrations

  • Fireflies and Linear integrations (more coming soon!)

Cleaner Navigation

  • Tools, Workflows, and CRM Packs now discoverable as tabs
  • Streamlined navigation throughout

The Brief Improvements

  • Full keyboard shortcuts to act on cards
  • Brief view mode persists across sessions

Several bug fixes based on your feedback

Built from your feedback: This release incorporates fixes and improvements from Raveesh, Shruti, Benjamin, Lucas, Matt H, Srini, and AJ's testing sessions.

item.title: Version 0.9.9.6.1
item.description:
Release 0.9.9.6.1

Making 0.9.9.6.1 rock-solid with critical bug fixes and performance improvements.

  • Performance Boost - Moved Brief processing to server for faster responses
  • The Brief: Solid & Reliable - Fixed missing cards, sorting, and meeting URLs
  • Integration Stability - Fixed Granola, Google APIs, and search tools
  • Organizations & Enrichment - LinkedIn enrichment and company profiles work reliably
  • CRM Improvements - Fixed familiarity tracking and contact creation
  • Agent Reliability - LLM retry logic recovers from AI failures
  • Critical Fixes - Fixed sign out crash and re-enabled automatic updates
